page.title: 09Modern Conveniences
page.content: We interviewed 89 people about modern conveniences in their homes.This is what we found out:- 77 people have a colour T.V. 27 people have a computer, 29 people have a microwave oven,85 people have a vacuum cleaner,38 people have a video,79 people have a music centre,56 people have a tumble dryer,89 people have a refrigerator or freezer,70 people have an automatic washing machine,25 people have a dish washer,67 people have a telephone, 85 people have radios and 60 people have a toaster.
